item.name: Hunting Lodge Estate
item.address1: 703 Mt Kilcoy Road, Mount Kilcoy, Qld 4515
item.description: Daryl and Vicki Higgins opened Hunting Lodge Estate on their 140ha cattle property in 1999, originally with a cellar door and B&B. A winery opened in 2002, and there is now a kaleidoscopic array of table and fortified wines available, mostly with African game park associations. For good measure, there is a personal museum of hunting trophies.
